title: Rap111
author: Rap111
content: I was introduced to Bitcoin in 2014, a friend of mine told me about Bitcoin, believe me, it didn't sound like a smart thing to my ears, I wish I had listened to my friend, I would have bought it in 2014. Unfortunately, I got to know it late and decided to buy Bitcoin in 2021. When Did You Meet Bitcoin? how much was the price ?

comments.body: Quote from: Rap111 on October 22, 2023, 03:16:12 PMI was introduced to Bitcoin in 2014, a friend of mine told me about Bitcoin, believe me, it didn't sound like a smart thing to my ears, I wish I had listened to my friend, I would have bought it in 2014. Well, that must be so regretful, but what we can do now, what happens is for good. I mean, the hack of MT GOX occurred in 2014 and you might become a victim of it, but you were saved, and of course, there could be many other possibilities like, you might be a billionaire now (depending on your investment). Well, overall, it is really sad, because, that time was a golden time. A few days back I was thinking the same, but I was thinking about 2009, like where I was in 2009 and what I was doing, then after remembering so much, I came to realize that I came to get access to the internet around 2013 or 2015 maybe. Not so sure, but in 2009 I was too young. Even I even talked to my cousin who used to be a software engineer, and he must have access to BTC, he said he with his friend made many BTC but now we don't know where those BTC went, and we don't have access to the drives and even did not kept the seed phrase save. Talking about my story, I came to know about BTC in 2018 when I got access to the internet, I joined so many online faucets and mining platforms, but made nothing, and after wasting around 2 months I left it by saying we could not earn BTC, unless we have some fan following. The rate of BTC at that time in local currency was around 8 Lac but now it is more than 80 lac.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: There are many threads already that are having similar topic or question like yours OP.But I started to know a bit about Bitcoin in early 2014. I only knew it as like any other stock in the market as what I have understood back then. I was a struggling freelancer during that time which I am financially broke and income isn’t stable that time.I thought back then that I should be buying 1 BTC, but I didn’t know that I can buy in fractions (satoshis) in which I have lack of education and understanding how Bitcoin works. It was just above $600 back then, but I cannot afford due to being broke.I ignored it for 3 1/2 years as I am focused on my work at home freelancing gigs and network marketing. I got into BTC again when it touched down $10k for the first time and that got me thinking on what if I did spare at least a few dollars to buy fractions of BTC back in 2014. Until now, I still regretted my decision back then of not buying but it is what it is.

comments.body: I guess almost everybody have the same story as mine lol A friend of mine introduced bitcoin when we are just high school, I'm on twenties now not so old not so young, that time I don't really have a money to invest or to try it on my own so I basically ignored it, I remember calling him like a "weirdo" coz who believes on internet money that time ha! But it turned out to be the way, when I saw him earning and keep telling us to join I gave it a shot, earned a lot of money, did the same thing to my friends and they called me "smart ass" for believing, then started chatting me on social media when I post something on my stories/reels " how do you do it bro", "Do you have a job?" some kind of messages and I'd just ignore them. The coin is circle my men.

I am just curious to know what made you decide to buy Bitcoin in 2021, because there was a bull run in 2017 when Bitcoin reached and all time high I would have thought you might have preferred to have bought then.To me I never saw Bitcoin as an investment opportunities thanks to the person that introduced me to Bitcoin and I wasn't all too concerned about the price of Bitcoin then. I was fascinated by the possibilities Bitcoin has over the traditional financial system and I think this mentality would give you more understanding and longevity in Bitcoin.

comments.author: Tiger420
comments.body: I was introduced to Bitcoin in 2016. I came to know about Bitcoin from a friend of mine. He said that Bitcoin is a digital currency that uses cryptography to secure transactions and prevent double spending. I was fascinated by the idea of ​​a peer-to-peer network that did not rely on any central authority or intermediary. I decided to buy some bitcoins in 2017, when the price was around $1,000. According to web search results, the price of Bitcoin in 2014 ranged from $340 to $1,0001. Bitcoin price in 2021 reached a peak of $68,991 on October 1

The place I come from, when someone wants to introduce something to you online, it is always termed scam, so we were very careful on what we will put our mind into and start with. Not until after 2020 after coronavirus that I was reintroduced into it and found out about this forum in early 2021. It has been an amazing journey and experience with the knowledge I have acquired so far about bitcoin. I always wished I had joined earlier, but sometimes I feel it wasn’t the right time for me to join and I actually joined at the right time now.
